name: Home Quest: A LegenDairy Journey
description:
You are a little youngin' and your parents have sent you on a quest to the store to get milk. The only thing standing in your way are... BEES!!!
Also, your dad has lots of jokes. Humor him for a bit before you go off on your quest!

CONTROLS
Move with WASD.
Aim bow with mouse.
Hold left click to pull back the bow release to fire.
Arrows will go further if you hold the left mouse button longer.

HINT
Bees will go straight for you, but will attempt to dodge arrows.
Once they dodge, they will be immobilized for a few seconds-- shoot them!

CREDITS
Concept and Scenario
Yi Zhu, David Ma, Tim Conceivable, Jonathan Bo, Jeff Hsu @silverhsu

Writing
Yi Zhu

Pixels
Tim Conceivable

Code
David Ma
Jeff Hsu @silverhsu

Music
“The Adventure Begins” by Philip Hayes

Voices
Sarah Wahoff

made in St. Louis at
Global Game Jam 2019
Jan 25-27, 2019
Theme: “What home means to you.”
